Class Automaton

java.lang.Object
Automaton
public abstract class Automaton extends Object
Abstract class that evolves the cellular automation according to the rule represented in the Rule class
Version:
0.1
Author:
Karly Meeks

    • createAutomaton

      public static Automaton createAutomaton​(CellularAutomaton ca, int ruleNum, Generation initial) throws RuleNumException
      returns the instance of the Automaton with the appropriate child
      Parameters:
      ca - is the value given from either the ECA or TCA method
      ruleNum - rule used to create Automaton
      initial - generation initially made
      Returns:
      instance of Automaton made
      Throws:
      RuleNumException - if the rule number input is invalid
